channel.title: Constraint Elements on UGENE Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Constraint Elements on UGENE Documentation

item.title: End-End Constraint Element
item.description:
End-End Constraint Element

Add the End-End constraint to some two algorithm elements. Lets denote these elements as alg1 and alg2.

Parameters in GUI

Parameter

Description

Default value

Min distance

Minimum distance between an alg1 annotation end and an alg2 annotation end.

0bp

Max distance

Maximum distance between an alg1 annotation end and an alg2 annotation end.

0bp

Constraint Explanation:

Let:

alg1_annot_end := the last nucleotide of an annotation obtained from the alg1.

item.title: End-Start Constraint Element
item.description:
End-Start Constraint Element

Add the End-Start constraint to some two algorithm elements. Lets denote these elements as alg1 and alg2.

Parameters in GUI

Parameter

Description

Default value

Min distance

Minimum distance between an alg1 annotation end and an alg2 annotation start.

0bp

Max distance

Maximum distance between an alg1 annotation end and an alg2 annotation start.

0bp

Constraint Explanation:

Let:

alg1_annot_end := the last nucleotide of an annotation obtained from the alg1.

item.title: Start-End Constraint Element
item.description:
Start-End Constraint Element

Add the Start-End constraint to some two algorithm elements. Lets denote these elements as alg1 and alg2.

Parameters in GUI

Parameter

Description

Default value

Min distance

Minimum distance between an alg1 annotation start and an alg2 annotation end.

0bp

Max distance

Maximum distance between an alg1 annotation start and an alg2 annotation end.

0bp

Constraint Explanation:

Let:

alg1_annot_start := the first nucleotide of an annotation obtained from the alg1.
